user_facing_guidance: Please provide comprehensive details about your email including: recipients, subject line, main purpose, tone preference, key messages to convey, and any specific requirements or constraints.

structure.recipients: List of email recipients (can be email addresses, names, or groups)
structure.subject: Email subject line - should be clear and compelling
structure.purpose: Main purpose or objective of the email
structure.tone: Professional, casual, friendly, urgent, or formal tone preference
structure.key_points: Key messages or information to convey in the email
structure.call_to_action: What you want recipients to do after reading the email
structure.deadline: Any deadline or timeline associated with the email
structure.sender_info: Context about the sender or any relevant background information

examples.subject: Weekly Team Update - Project Status
examples.purpose: Share project progress and next steps with the team
examples.call_to_action: Review the update and provide feedback by Friday
examples.sender_info: Project Manager for the Alpha Initiative
